item.title: vasplib basic bandplot
item.description: 文章的部分内容被密码保护： --- DON'T MODIFY THIS LINE --- [**vasplib:bandplot**](https://gitee.com/tcmp/vasplib/blob/master/bin/bandplot.m) # bandplot ## Label: - vasp - band - spinless ## Description of the Script: plot a band stucture of standard vasp output ### Input: 1. Files: POSCAR KPOINTS EIGENVAL/BAND.dat DOSCAR/Efermi ### Output: 1. band-structure with nice output ### Note: ### Change log - Document Date: 2020/12/05 - Creation Date: 2020/12/05 - Last updated : 2020/12/05 ### Copyright - parkman - [parkman@buaa.
